item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, whenever I spawn the custom I added, it looks nothing like what I made and whenver I wear it, it doesn’t even look like a sword, here are the ints, why won’t it work?

		case 12334:
		itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.modelID = 12333; //drop model
		itemDef.anInt165 = 12334; //male wield model
		itemDef.anInt200 = 12334; //femArmModel
		itemDef.modelZoom = 848;
		itemDef.aByte154 = -14;
		itemDef.modelRotationY = 267;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 136;
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
		itemDef.aByte154 = -14;
		itemDef.name = "HaizScape Sword";
		itemDef.description = "A HaizScape Sword".getBytes();
		break;

Read full topic
